mapper.select: select projecttaskstep.* from projecttaskstep left join project2taskstep on projecttaskstep.id = project2taskstep.taskstepId WHERE project2taskstep.moduleType = #{moduleType} and (project2taskstep.taskType = #{taskType} or project2taskstep.taskType = -1) and project2taskstep.type = #{type} ORDER BY projecttaskstep.orderId
